items.title: Road rage shooting of pregnant 17-year-old in Louisiana sparks outrage from officials
items.description: Louisiana officials are outraged over a road rage shooting that killed a pregnant 17-year-old and caused her baby to be delivered early

items.title: Trump administration is investing in US rare earths in a push to break China's grip
items.description: The U.S. is ramping up efforts to boost production of crucial components used in electric vehicles, smartphones and fighter jets

items.title: Firefighters try to corral California forest blaze as lightning strikes bring risk of new ignitions

items.title: Judge rejects Cuomo's attempt to make texts in harassment lawsuit public
items.description: Former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo's attempt to continue a legal battle involving an ex-aide's sexual harassment claim has been rejected by a judge

items.title: A Kansas City, Kansas, police officer has died after being struck by a fleeing driver
items.description: A Kansas City, Kansas, police officer has died after a fleeing driver hit tire-deflating devices and veered into him, authorities said
